mapper.select: select sc.company_id ,sc.company_code ,sc.company_name_kr ,sc.company_name_en ,sc.begin_date ,sc.end_date ,sc.user_yn ,sc.address_line1 ,sc.address_line2 ,sc.zip_code ,sc.email_address ,sc.telephone_number ,sc.description ,sc.create_by ,sc.create_date ,sc.update_by ,sc.update_date from sys_company sc where 1=1 order by sc.company_code
